QuestData.Title: Craftsman Needs No Tools
QuestData.Description: Oh, I am quite all right! There's just one little thing....$b$bOne of these fiends made off with my lucky mallet! I simply cannot leave my mallet behind. I do not even use it much any more, but it is quite lucky and I always keep it with me.$b$bPlease, I cannot even think about building anything without it. Do keep an eye out for it, will you?
QuestData.RewardText: Oh, you found it! How lucky, do you see?
